profile.bio: Gordon Oheim is a Software Developer from Essen, Germany with a strong focus on object-oriented design and programming. Gordon is currently a Senior Software Engineer for Instana, Inc where he helps to build the next-gen APM solution. Gordon is a Zend Certified Engineer and has more than ten years of experience with web-related technologies. He is also a member of the PHP documentation team. Gordon is keenly interested in Agile and Lean topics and likes to share his knowledge on Stack Overflow, where he is the top 1 contributor to the PHP tag.
